author: xinbenlv
content:
per <@543900561460822016> suggestion, posting here

Hi <#688075293562503241>  , I'd like to request for comment for a [EIP-5081](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5081) to add Expiration to transaction payload, [discussion](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-5081-expirable-transaction/9208) particular for you to provide feedback on the risk and solution of vulnerability of denial of service attack

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Are there any Sepolia block explorers besides https://sepolia.otterscan.io/ ?  Also sepolia.otterscan seems to have crashed/reset as it doesn't show any data, anyone know who runs that?
